author: newsr.in
title: Pele: Football can prosper in India if kids are exposed to it at an early age
text: Pele on Monday offered a solution to bring Indian football out of its current abyss, saying that the game should be made an integral part of growing up for kids besides ensuring maximum foreign exposure for promising players Â»
